name: Gravel [Arknights] Freefit LoRA
description:
_____

Updated to my current standards of LoRAs as of 5/24/23.

V1 is DEPRECATED. Use V2 instead.

Trained on 768 resolution and has a better dataset, resulting in higher quality and even more flexibility.

_____

This LoRA has been curated and modified over several iterations to offer the highest degree of control for Gravel while maintaining character accuracy.

Also includes Gravel's alternate outfit, Modeling Night.

The amount of tags used for prompting are necessary in order to both replicate the character and to offer flexibility should you desire to put her in different clothing and situations.

NSFW compatible.

Lower the weight as necessary, but works at 1.

Pocket colors on the jacket will not appear properly. Photoshop them in or inpaint.
______


IMPORTANT NOTE:

You may need to weigh (partially unzipped) higher.

It also helps to put the following into the negatives to maintain a closed jacket appearance:

  • open jacket

  • navel

Minor outfit bleed is present. I did my best to control for it.

For gravel's main outfit, include the following into the negatives:

  • black shirt, high-waist shorts, torn leotard
